subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Quality Road, undefeated in three starts this year and ranked as the nation’s leading male thoroughbred, was made the 2-5 morning line favorite for Saturday’s Whitney Handicap at Saratoga Race Course.
snippet: Quality Road, undefeated in three starts this year and ranked as the nation’s leading male thoroughbred, was made the 2-5 morning line favorite for Saturday’s Whitney Handicap at Saratoga Race Course.
